question.title: How to Resume File Download with ChannelSftp in JSch After a Disconnect
question.body:
I'm using the JSch library to download a file from an SFTP server using ChannelSftp. The basic download works as expected with the following code:

channelSftp.get(String source, String destination);

If the connection is interrupted during transfer, how can I resume the download from where it left off instead of restarting from the beginning?

Is there a way to achieve this with ChannelSftp, or do I need to implement a workaround?
